data.description: Generator for large batches of (web) buttons
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
While developping a large scale, multiple language, multiple themed
    website we found out, that our web designer used weeks and weeks
    designing buttons for forms, menus, toolbars etc.

    After searching CPAN I was not able to find a module with similiar
    functionality, so I decided to write one.

    The choice of namespace is obvious:

    Image - because the generated buttons are images ButtonMaker -
    because the generated images are buttons
